project.assignedNode: SLURM.SMALL.023 || SLURM.SMALL.020 || SLURM.005 || SLURM.004 || SLURM.SMALL.005 || SLURM.SMALL.001 || SLURM.SMALL.000 || SLURM.SMALL.009

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# for debugging echo $NODE_NAME hostname build_date=`date +%m-%d-%Y` echo "build date = <$build_date>" echo "USER=$USER" echo "HOME=$HOME" echo "PWD=$PWD" echo "WORKSPACE=$WORKSPACE"
set -x
fusdk_private_url="https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/view/Tools/job/syssw-automation/job/fusdk-meta-sifive-private/buildWithParameters?"
echo "===> Trigger FUSDK autobuilt with sifive-fpga" curl ${fusdk_private_url}token=FUSDKAutoBuild\&FUSDK_MACHINE=sifive-fpga\&META_SIFIVE_PRIVATE_BRANCH=rel/sifive-fpga/202103\&FUSDK_MANIFEST=tools/manifests/sifive.xml
#echo "Trigger FUSDK autobuilt with QEMU" #curl ${fusdk_private_url}token=FUSDKAutoBuild&FUSDK_MACHINE=sifive-fpga
#echo "Trigger FUSDK autobuilt with Unmatched" #curl ${fusdk_private_url}token=FUSDKAutoBuild&FUSDK_MACHINE=sifive-fpga
echo "=== end of batch autobuild ===" set +x
